value.text:
name = 'Joe '
age = 24
occupation = 'Sales Associate '
height = "6'1 "
eye_color = 'Brown '

print name + '\n' + str(age) + '\n' + occupation + '\n' + height + '\n' + eye_color

def Speak():
	speech.say("I know who you are now",'None',.2)

Speak()

parameters.__custom_action_script__:
import workflow
params = workflow.get_parameters()
source = params['Source']

exec source

workflow.set_output(source)
